column2: Armor Increase - Increases physical armor by [1] and magic armor by [2]
Character has increased armor from a combat shield.
Character is covering a nearby ally, and will counter-attack the first attempted attack.
Character is being covered by a nearby ally.
Character is encased in a chained shell, and cannot act or take damage.
Character will receive an AP and initiative bonus when released.

Character is taking a defensive position until their next turn.
Reduces critical hit damage by 25%.
